titleStmt.title: To King William and Queen Mary, grace and peace The widow Whitrow's humble thanksgiving to the Lord of Hosts, the king of eternal glory, the God of all our mercies, unto whom be glory, glory, and praise for the king's safe return to England.
titleStmt.author: Whitrowe, Joan.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by most book-sellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of text: Jone Whitrowe, Putney, New-years day,1691/2.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, University of Cambridge.
